statements: DELETE FROM construction_costs_expenses WHERE project_id = 1;

DELETE FROM construction_costs_expenses WHERE project_id = 100 AND expense_date > '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM expenses WHERE expense_category = 'Travel' OR (project_name = 'Project B' AND expense_amount < 1000);

DELETE FROM employees WHERE project_id = 201 AND first_name = 'John';
